Species: Full species name, for example Cecropia insignis
Leaf_match: Were the gas exchange and spectra measured in the exact same leaf or distinct, similar leaves? Choose between "Same" and "Similar".
Sun_Shade: Was the leaf at the top of the canopy and usually receiving light (sun) or a shaded leaf? Choose between Sun, Shade or leave empty
Soil: Please choose between natural ground, pot, or managed ground (Natural, Pot, Managed)
LMA: Leaf dry mass per unit area in g m-2
Narea: Nitrogen content of leaf per unit leaf area in g m-2
Nmass: Nitrogen content of leaf by dry mass in mg g-1
Parea: Phosphorus content of leaf per unit leaf area in g m-2
Pmass: Phosophorus content of leaf by dry mass in mg g-1
LWC: Leaf water content. Percent water content of fresh leaf by mass in % (0-100)
